Plot: A fictionalized account of the first major successful sexual harassment case in the United States -- Jenson vs. Eveleth Mines, where a woman who endured a range of abuse while working as a miner filed and won the landmark 1984 lawsuit.
Title: North Country
Writer: Michael Seitzman (screenplay), Clara Bingham (book), Laura Leedy (book)
Actors: Charlize Theron, Thomas Curtis, Elle Peterson, Frances McDormand
tomatoConsensus: Though sometimes melodramatic and formulaic, North Country is nonetheless a rousing, powerful story of courage and humanity.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 6 wins & 17 nominations.
